general.study_notes: The area bordered by lines displays the impact of policy rate shocks; the shadowed area shows the impact of the balance sheet shocks.

model_notes.model_1: an expansionary policy rate shock of the size of one standard deviation, meaning a decrease in the repo rate of about 1 percentage point for Sweden; decomposition: policy rate shock and balance sheet shock, only policy rate shock is extracted.
model_notes.model_2: an expansionary policy rate shock of one standard deviation, which is a cut of about 0.3 percentage points in the overnight lending rate for Norway; decomposition: policy rate shock and balance sheet shock, only policy rate shock is extracted.
model_notes.model_3: an expansionary policy rate shock of the size of one standard deviation, or a cut of about 0.3 percentage points in the repo rate for Denmark; decomposition: policy rate shock and balance sheet shock, only policy rate shock is extracted.
